Trade/Device Name(s): CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel, Influenza A/H5 Subtyping Kit (VER 3)
Submitter Information: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Instrumentation for clinical multiplex test systems
Reagents for detection of specific novel influenza A virus
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Applied Biosystems 7500 Fast Dx Real-Time PCR Instrument
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel, Influenza A/H5 Subtyping Kit (VER 3) for detection and characterization of influenza A/H5 (Asian lineage) in human respiratory specimens using real-time RT-PCR.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for presumptive identification of influenza A subtype A/H5 (Asian lineage) in human respiratory specimens and viral culture to support diagnosis and surveillance, using real-time RT-PCR on ABI 7500 Fast Dx, in conjunction with clinical and epidemiological information.
